WorkItem.Description:
Getting dialog:

Visual Studio has encountered an exception. This may be caused by an extension.

You can get more information by running the application together with the /log parameter on the command line, and then examining the file 'C:\Users\frank.spafford\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\VisualStudio\10.0\ActivityLog.xml'.

The file is attached. I am using Visual Studio 2010 with Windows 7 64-bit.

I would like Chirpy (tried 2.0.0.6) to work, but if not, how do you uninstall Chirpy?
WorkItem.Summary: Get a Visual Studio exception after installing.

Comments.Message:
" how do you uninstall Chirpy? "

Remove file in your addin folder
C:\Users\frank.spafford\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\AddIns\Zippy.Addin
